snippet: The death toll from the quake that struck Yunnan Province on Sunday has jumped to 589 as rescuers reached isolated villages and recovered the bodies of 179 more victims, the state media reported
abstract: Chinese state media reports that death toll from an earthquake that struck Yunnan Province in southwestern China has jumped to 589 as rescuers reach isolated villages and recover the bodies of 179 more victims.
lead_paragraph: The death toll from the quake that struck Yunnan Province on Sunday has jumped to 589 as rescuers reached isolated villages and recovered the bodies of 179 more victims, the state media reported

headline.main: Earthquake Death Toll Rises to Nearly 600 in China
